title: Tobacco Cards Wanted at East Coast Natl.
author: Steve_NY

posts.post_title: Tobacco Cards Wanted at East Coast Natl.
posts.post_content:
I will be set up at this year's East Coast National in Westchester County August 19-22 looking to buy collections of tobacco cards (sports and non sports cards). I will also be selling the same--including pre-1900s through 1910s, 1920s through 1940s, and 1950s through 1960s.

I will be set up to the left of the main entrance in the first row second booth opposite the restaurant. This will be my first East Coast National in 8 years as I tend to cruise at that time - but I am cruising later this year instead.

You can contact me in advance to determine whether I am interested in what you have to sell, and whether I have what you want to buy. 

Steve Sabow
914-522-3853
[url]Dynamictwo@aol.com[/url]

Reminder: Bring me your collections in Westchester County, NY on Thurdsay from 5 PM - 9 PM, Friday 11-8, Saturday 10-5, and Sunday 10-4.

Steve
Steve -going forward, any plans for Valley Forge in September?
